person.persName: Leroy C. Boyd (Harrison County, merchant, 1st serg. 40th KY Mtd Inf. USA)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, Farmer, merchant, and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew Boyd and Hannah Boyd. Married to Emma Roper Boyd in Harrison County, Kentucky, on May 1, 1865. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1850. Merchant in Harrison County in 1860. Household owned nine enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1860. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863. Served in the 40th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first sergeant from September 1, 1863, to December 30, 1864.
